# costradar_user (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "costradar_user" "this" {
  email = "user@gmail.com"
  name = "User"
  initials = "U"
  icon_url = "url://"
  tags = {
    tenant = "costradar"
  }
}
```

- **initials** (String)
- **tags** (Map of String)
